job_description: QA Analyst with IOT Solutions - job post Spanco Solutions Plano, TX 75023 • Remote From $50 an hour -  Contract Responded to 51-74% of applications in the past 30 days, typically within 21 days. Apply now Apply now save-icon Job details Salary From $50 an hour Job Type Contract Job Title: Sr. QA Analyst - IoT Solutions Duration: 6+ months contract Location: Plano, TX (initial weeks can be remote) Job Description: Duties and Responsibilities: Be a team player, someone who can communicate eﬀectively with our customers. Adhere to established Quality Assurance standards. Analyze requirements and technical specifications and implement assigned QA tasks using various technologies. Ability to troubleshoot various issues in diﬀerent environments including Production. Mentor other junior QA Engineers in the team. Experience in crafting Quality automation frameworks from scratch, QE automation frameworks and tools for backend applications, such as Cucumber, TestNG, JMeter, SOAPUI Ability to work in a fast-paced environment with frequent context switching Minimum Qualiﬁcations: Computer science degree; master's preferred 5+ years of experience in a QA Automation engineer role. 3+ years of experience testing high available & performant systems using AWS oﬀerings. 1+ years of experience in testing IoT solutions. Requirements and General Skills: Team player and is a skilled communicator both verbally and in writing. Acts with professionalism both in person and when working remotely with external / internal stakeholders. Self-managed, with the ability to prioritize and work in a fast-paced environment. Excellent problem-solving skills, willingness to learn new technologies and skills. Technical Skills: Recent experience in testing and managing test strategies for highly available distributed applications using AWS Cloud Services. Exposure to security domains including areas like PKI, Certificates, Cryptography & Security aspects is preferred. Experience in Java, SQL/ NoSQL, and REST APIs for test automation. Excellent knowledge of QE automation architecture, methodologies, processes, and tools Familiar with Continuous Integration (CI), DevOps and experienced in setting up QA automation Good understanding of MQTT, IoT protocols is desired Must have Programming / Scripting Knowledge such as Java, Python, Groovy, etc. Expert level technical knowledge in developing test automation - Cucumber, TestNG, JMeter, PostMan, SoapUI. Familiar with AWS Services such as – API Gateway, IoT, CloudWatch, DynamoDB, S3 etc. Manual & Automated Testing REST APIs using JSON, other messaging protocols. Follow Agile best practices to embed the Quality Assurance part of the Agile delivery methodology. Preferred Skills: Familiarity with embedded testing, end-end connected device testing. Experience in the performance automation. QA Automation Test Certification is preferred Job Type: Contract Salary: From $50.00 per hour Schedule: 8 hour shift Work Location: One location If you require alternative methods of application or screening, you must approach the employer directly to request this as Indeed is not responsible for the employer's application process.
